Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant that has lived and grown with water and light.
The student can draw a plant that has not lived and grown due to a lack of water.
The student can draw a plant that has not lived and grown due to a lack of light.
The student can label each drawing to show whether it had water and light or not.
The student can illustrate a pattern by showing what happens to plants with different amounts of water and light.
